subject: Shoes and Boots
Athletics and Sports
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: For a fledgling athletic-shoe company, there is only one thing better for business than having an N.B.A. star endorse your new shoes: have the league ban the shoes from its courts.
snippet: For a fledgling athletic-shoe company, there is only one thing better for business than having an N.B.A. star endorse your new shoes: have the league ban the shoes from its courts.
